Items.Description: Open 'http://localhost/targetprocess/api/v1/testcaseruns.asmx/{TestCaseRunId}?skip=0&take=999&include=[Id,Bugs]' link where {TestCaseRunId} is your Test Case Run Id in a browser
Items.Result:
Something like the following:
<TestCaseRun Id="{Id}">
<Bugs>
<Bug Id="{BugId}" Name="Your Bug name"/>
</Bugs>
</TestCaseRun>
